I'm getting to this comment so late!! But now I'm dying to know if you're still wearing it!

item.title: By: Nancy Drew Bourget
item.dc:creator: Nancy Drew Bourget
item.description: Hi =) I just randomly came across your story while researching Lust... And all I can say is WTF You remind me of someone and I know, and that is me. Your chosen words, the context of the story, I swear to gawd, it was like being in my head. Was well is kind of exciting to know someone else out there gets it. The joint the perfume the memories the sick to your stomach, I think it was the "bangs" comment that made me say I am saying hello !!!! LOL. Great piece.
item.content:encoded: Hi =) I just randomly came across your story while researching Lust… And all I can say is WTF You remind me of someone and I know, and that is me. Your chosen words, the context of the story, I swear to gawd, it was like being in my head. Was well is kind of exciting to know someone else out there gets it. The joint the perfume the memories the sick to your stomach, I think it was the “bangs” comment that made me say I am saying hello !!!! LOL. Great piece.

item.title: By: Eryn
item.dc:creator: Eryn
item.description: Okay, so this is a reply almost 2 yrs after you wrote this post. But something I loooove doing (guilty pleasure) when I fall in love with a scent is to google random reviews about it to get a feel for how others love (or hate) it. Lust is such an in-your-face scent that I've been a tad apprehensive about wearing it to events where people may be offended by its potency. It's defintely not a subtle or common fragrance that you catch a whiff of time to time. So heady and loud. I went directly to Lush with my two toddlers (a brave adventure) after reading such intriguing reviews about "Lust" and just HAD to smell. It's nothing like I had imagined and honestly made me almost gag as I excitedly held my hand up to my nose after a quick spritz. It just wasn't what I had expected and so we left the store and walked around the mall for a bit. But then... I COULD NOT STOP SMELLING MY HAND. It's like trying to look away from something horrifying, but you can't stop. I got home that night and must have randomly lifted my hand to my nose over 50 times throughout the evening. I went back two days later and bought it. It's so strange to me how many people had the exact same reaction in reviews. Being completely knocked in the face by it and then can't get enough. I enjoyed your entire post, even the backstory leading into the review. Nothing can quite prepare you for this scent. But then it's an obsession.. I will try it as my signature scent for the next few weeks/months and see how it goes. Some say they get constant compliments and inquiries when wearing it, and others say it makes everyone around them instantly disgusted, hahah. I guess it's a love/hate fragrance. There's really no on-the-fence with this one..

It’s nothing like I had imagined and honestly made me almost gag as I excitedly held my hand up to my nose after a quick spritz. It just wasn’t what I had expected and so we left the store and walked around the mall for a bit. But then… I COULD NOT STOP SMELLING MY HAND. It’s like trying to look away from something horrifying, but you can’t stop. I got home that night and must have randomly lifted my hand to my nose over 50 times throughout the evening. I went back two days later and bought it. It’s so strange to me how many people had the exact same reaction in reviews. Being completely knocked in the face by it and then can’t get enough. I enjoyed your entire post, even the backstory leading into the review. Nothing can quite prepare you for this scent. But then it’s an obsession.. I will try it as my signature scent for the next few weeks/months and see how it goes. Some say they get constant compliments and inquiries when wearing it, and others say it makes everyone around them instantly disgusted, hahah. I guess it’s a love/hate fragrance. There’s really no on-the-fence with this one..

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lush-lust-perfume/#comment-1447">Katie Riehn Whitaker</a>.
It was a few years ago, so they might have discontinued it again. I found some on Amazon just now, so check there! It's more expensive, but it's an option. Sorry I couldn't be more help! XO
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Katie Riehn Whitaker.

It was a few years ago, so they might have discontinued it again. I found some on Amazon just now, so check there! It’s more expensive, but it’s an option. Sorry I couldn’t be more help! XO

item.title: By: Katie Riehn Whitaker
item.dc:creator: Katie Riehn Whitaker
item.description: Ok, so I am the opposite bc NBJ was my scent as a newlywed and life change... I really want to find it again! You said you ordered it on their site....I cannot find it. Would you mind sending a link to where you found it? Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Ok, so I am the opposite bc NBJ was my scent as a newlywed and life change… I really want to find it again! You said you ordered it on their site….I cannot find it. Would you mind sending a link to where you found it? Thanks!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lush-lust-perfume/#comment-1088">Heather</a>.
Thanks!! Isn't it so weird how those smells bring up all those old feelings? BLECHH! Just imagine the hordes that can't smell cucumber melon anymore!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Heather.

Thanks!! Isn’t it so weird how those smells bring up all those old feelings? BLECHH! Just imagine the hordes that can’t smell cucumber melon anymore!

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: I stumbled upon this review and loved every word of it. Seriously. I was just looking for random-ass reviews of my new favorite perfume. It's such a sexy perfume, it really, really is. And Sensual Amber was mine. And when I smell it on someone now I want to puke.
item.content:encoded: I stumbled upon this review and loved every word of it. Seriously. I was just looking for random-ass reviews of my new favorite perfume. It’s such a sexy perfume, it really, really is. And Sensual Amber was mine. And when I smell it on someone now I want to puke.

item.title: By: shikha
item.dc:creator: shikha
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lush-lust-perfume/#comment-536">Sarah Cosper</a>.
No, I have not. I didn't notice jasmine in the descriptions, but I will try it out next time!!! If you know of any other jasmine scents, please let me know!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

No, I have not. I didn’t notice jasmine in the descriptions, but I will try it out next time!!! If you know of any other jasmine scents, please let me know!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/lush-lust-perfume/#comment-532">shikha</a>.
YES! A social superpower! I like to pretend I just naturally smell like that. "Oh, that? It's just my essence. No big deal." Have you smelled their other jasmine scent, Sikkim Girls? It's great too!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to shikha.

YES! A social superpower! I like to pretend I just naturally smell like that. “Oh, that? It’s just my essence. No big deal.” Have you smelled their other jasmine scent, Sikkim Girls? It’s great too!
